title: Building Pop-up Villages that Accelerate Real World Crypto Adoption
description:
Join us to explore the growing trend of popup villages and popup cities, starting with Zuzalu. We'll look at how these short-term communities have helped the crypto world and beyond.

You'll hear real stories from Zuzalu, ZuConnect, Edge City, Aleph / Crecimiento, The Mu, MegaZu and ZuThailand. We'll talk about how these villages can speed up new ideas, but discuss where we need to try more things.
